Eco-Friendly Cart: Design a shopping cart that uses biodegradable materials, reducing plastic waste and promoting sustainability.
Foldable Cart: Create a shopping cart that can fold in half or roll up, making it easy to transport and store in small spaces.
Personalized Cart: Offer a customizable shopping cart that can be personalized with the user's name, contact information, and preferred language.
Virtual Cart: Develop a virtual shopping cart that can be used on mobile devices, allowing users to add items and track their shopping list from anywhere.
Smart Cart with Nutrition Information: Integrate nutrition facts and allergen warnings into the shopping cart, helping users make healthier food choices.
